commit.message:
Lancer le convertisseur gtfs-geojson depuis l'application (#1802)

* install rambo

* temp : add an executable locally

* plug the converter instead of the validation

* adapt docker dev

* add external-tools folder to path

* update call to geojson converter

* move code in a separate controller

* create a env variable for the external tools folder

* use the env variable in the code

* create some tests to check the converter can be called

* no need the change the container PATH

* update the docker file : add the converter binary

* update mix.lock

* fix gtfs.zip path

* fix tests and formatting

* name docker stages

* external-tools must not be in the repo

* copy transport tools in CI too

* add setup_remote_docker

* correct ci config

* test ci config

* test ci config : install docker

* test ci

* add -y option

* remove sudo

* test with transport-tools in the docker base image

* ci config

* test ci

* use secret token to protect url

* change base container name
